00027 void eol_level_init()
00028 {
00029   cpInitChipmunk();
00030   eol_logger_message(
00031       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00032       "eol_level:initializing\n");
00033   _eol_level_manager = eol_resource_manager_init(
00034     "eol_level_manager",
00035     _eol_level_max,
00036     sizeof(eolLevel),
00037     eolTrue,
00038     eol_level_delete,
00039     eol_level_load_data_from_file
00040     );
00041   eol_logger_message(
00042       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00043       "eol_level:initialized\n");
00044   atexit(eol_level_close);
00045   _eol_level_initialized = eolTrue;
00046 
00047 }

00054 void eol_level_config()
00055 {
00056   eolConfig *conf = NULL;
00057   _eol_level_max_layers = 3;
00058   _eol_level_max = 10;
00059   _eol_level_layer_draw_range = 1;
00060   _eol_level_draw_mode = eolLevelDrawFull;
00061   conf = eol_config_load("system/level.cfg");
00062   if (conf == NULL)return;
00063   eol_config_get_uint_by_tag(&_eol_level_draw_mode,conf,"drawLevel");
00064   eol_config_get_uint_by_tag(&_eol_level_layer_draw_range,conf,"drawDepth");
00065 }

00077 void eol_level_clear()
00078 {
00079   if (!eol_level_initialized())
00080   {
00081     eol_logger_message(
00082         EOL_LOG_INFO,
00083         "eol_level:cannot clean, not initialized\n");
00084     return;
00085   }
00086   if (!_eol_level_manager)return;
00087   eol_resource_manager_clean(_eol_level_manager);
00088 
00089 }

00091 void eol_level_close()
00092 {
00093   eol_logger_message(
00094       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00095       "eol_level:closing\n"
00096   );
00097   eol_resource_manager_free(&_eol_level_manager);
00098   _eol_level_max = 0;
00099   _eol_level_max_layers = 1;
00100   _eol_level_initialized = eolFalse;
00101   eol_logger_message(
00102       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00103       "eol_level:closed\n"
00104   );
00105 }

00107 void eol_level_free(eolLevel **level)
00108 {
00109   if (!eol_level_initialized())return;
00110   if (_eol_level_current == *level)
00111   {
00112     _eol_level_current = NULL;
00113   }
00114   eol_resource_free_element(_eol_level_manager,(void **)level);
00115 }

00117 void eol_level_delete_layer(eolLevelLayer * level)
00118 {
00119   eolBackground *b = NULL;
00120   GList *s,*e;
00121   if (!level)return;
00122 
00123   /*TODO: free tile set*/
00124   eol_mesh_free(&level->clipMesh);
00125   
00126   if (level->tileMap.map != NULL)free(level->tileMap.map);
00127   
00128   for (s = level->spawnList; s != NULL; s = s->next)
00129   {
00130     eol_spawn_free((eolSpawn *)s->data);
00131   }
00132   s = NULL;
00133   g_list_free(level->spawnList);
00134   for (s = level->backgrounds; s != NULL; s = s->next)
00135   {
00136     if (s->data == NULL)continue;
00137     b = (eolBackground *)s->data;
00138     eol_model_free(&b->model);
00139     free(b);
00140   }
00141   s = NULL;
00142   g_list_free(level->backgrounds);
00143 
00144   for (e = level->entities;e != NULL;e = e->next)
00145   {
00146     eol_entity_remove_from_space(e->data);
00147   }
00148   g_list_free(level->entities);/*just free our pointers to em, they can delete themselves*/
00149   if (level->space != NULL)cpSpaceFree(level->space);
00150 }
00151 
00152 void eol_level_delete(void *data)
00153 {
00154   eolLevel *level;
00155   GList *l = NULL;
00156   if (!data)return;
00157   level = (eolLevel *)data;
00158   for (l = level->layers; l != NULL;l = l->next)
00159   {
00160     eol_level_delete_layer(l->data);
00161   }
00162   g_list_free(level->layers);
00163   memset(level,0,sizeof(eolLevel));
00164 }

00171 eolLevelLayer *eol_level_add_layer(eolLevel *level)
00172 {
00173   eolLevelLayer *layer = NULL;
00174   if (!level)return NULL;
00175   layer = (eolLevelLayer*)malloc(sizeof(eolLevelLayer));
00176   if (layer == NULL)
00177   {
00178     eol_logger_message(
00179       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00180       "eol_level:failed to allocated a layer for level %s\n",
00181       level->idName);
00182     return NULL;
00183   }
00184   memset(layer,0,sizeof(eolLevelLayer));
00185 
00186   layer->space = cpSpaceNew();
00187   if (layer->space == NULL)
00188   {
00189     eol_logger_message(
00190       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00191       "Unable to create a physics space for new layer in level %s!\n",
00192       level->idName);
00193     eol_level_delete_layer(layer);
00194     return NULL;
00195   }
00196   layer->space->iterations = 10;/*NOTE: make configurable*/
00197   layer->space->sleepTimeThreshold = 999999;
00198   
00199   level->layers = g_list_append(level->layers,layer);
00200   level->layerCount++;
00201   return layer;
00202 }

00204 eolBackground *eol_level_add_background_to_layer(eolLevelLayer *layer)
00205 {
00206   eolBackground *back;
00207   if (!layer)return NULL;
00208   back = (eolBackground*)malloc(sizeof(eolBackground));
00209   if (back == NULL)
00210   {
00211     eol_logger_message(
00212       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00213       "eol_level:failed to allocated a background for layer %s\n",
00214       layer->idName);
00215     return NULL;
00216   }
00217   layer->backgrounds = g_list_append(layer->backgrounds,back);
00218   return back;
00219 }

00221 eolLevel *eol_level_new()
00222 {
00223   eolLevel *level = NULL;
00224   if (!eol_level_initialized())
00225   {
00226     eol_logger_message(
00227       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00228       "eol_entdow:used uninitialized\n");
00229     return NULL;
00230   }
00231   level = (eolLevel *)eol_resource_new_element(_eol_level_manager);
00232   if (level == NULL)
00233   {
00234     eol_logger_message(
00235       EOL_LOG_INFO,
00236       "eol_level:failed to get new resource\n");
00237     return NULL;
00238   }
00239   return level;
00240 }

00246 void eol_level_draw_current()
00247 {
00248   if (!eol_level_initialized())return;
00249   if (_eol_level_current == NULL)return;
00250   switch (_eol_level_draw_mode)
00251   {
00252     case eolLevelDrawFull:
00253       eol_level_draw(_eol_level_current);
00254       break;
00255     case eolLevelDrawClip:
00256       eol_level_draw_clip(_eol_level_current);
00257       break;
00258   }
00259 }

00261 void eol_level_draw_background(eolBackground * back)
00262 {
00263   if (!back)return;
00264   if (!back->model)return;
00265   eol_model_draw(
00266     back->model,
00267     back->ori.position,
00268     back->ori.rotation,
00269     back->ori.scale,
00270     back->ori.color,
00271     back->ori.alpha,
00272     0
00273   );
00274 }

00276 void eol_level_draw_layer_backgrounds(eolLevelLayer *layer)
00277 {
00278   GList *b;
00279   if (!layer)return;
00280   for (b = layer->backgrounds; b != NULL; b= b->next)
00281   {
00282     eol_level_draw_background((eolBackground *)b->data);
00283   }
00284 }

00292     layer->clipMaskOri.rotation,
00293     layer->clipMaskOri.scale,

00300 void eol_level_draw_layer_bounds(eolLevelLayer *layer)
00301 {
00302   eolOrientation ori;
00303   if (!layer)return;
00304   eol_orientation_clear(&ori);
00305   eol_draw_rect_3D(layer->bounds,ori);
00306 }
00307 
00308 void eol_level_draw(eolLevel *level)
00309 {
00310   int i;
00311   GList *layerNode = NULL;
00312   eolLevelLayer *layer = NULL;
00313   float alpha = 1;
00314   if (!level)return;
00315   if (!level->layers)return;
00316   i = level->active - _eol_level_layer_draw_range;
00317   if (i < 0)i = 0;
00318   layerNode = g_list_nth(level->layers,i);
00319   for (;(layerNode != NULL) && (i < level->active + _eol_level_layer_draw_range);
00320         layerNode = layerNode->next,i++)
00321   {
00322     if (layerNode->data == NULL)continue;
00323     if (i >= level->active)alpha = 0.25;
00324     layer = (eolLevelLayer *)layerNode->data;
00325     layer->alpha = alpha;
00326     eol_level_draw_layer_backgrounds(layer);
00327   }
00328 }
00329 
00330 void eol_level_draw_clip(eolLevel *level)
00331 {
00332   eolLevelLayer *layer;
00333   if (!level)return;
00334   if (!level->layers)return;
00335   layer = g_list_nth_data(level->layers,level->active);
00336   if (layer == NULL)
00337   {
00338     eol_logger_message(
00339       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00340       "cannot get layer %n for level %s\n",
00341       level->active,
00342       level->idName);
00343     return;
00344   }
00345   eol_level_draw_layer_bounds(layer);
00346   eol_level_draw_layer_clipmask(layer);
00347 }

00349 void eol_level_set_active_layer(eolLevel *level, eolUint layer)
00350 {
00351   if (!level)return;
00352   if (!level->layers)return;
00353   if (layer >= level->layerCount)
00354   {
00355     eol_logger_message(
00356       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00357       "eol_level:cannot set active layer %i for level %s\n",
00358       layer,
00359       level->idName);
00360     return;
00361   }
00362   level->active = layer;
00363 }

00365 void eol_level_set_current_level(eolLevel *level)
00366 {
00367   if (!level)return;
00368   if (!level->layers)return;
00369   _eol_level_current = level;

00376 cpShape *eol_level_add_segment_to_space(eolFloat sx,
00377                                         eolFloat sy,
00378                                         eolFloat ex,
00379                                         eolFloat ey,
00380                                         cpSpace *space)
00381 {
00382   cpShape *shape;
00383   float friction = 0.1;
00384   if(space == NULL)return NULL;
00385   shape = cpSegmentShapeNew(cpSpaceGetStaticBody(space), cpv(sx,sy), cpv(ex,ey), 0.0);
00386   if (sx == ex)
00387   {
00388     friction = 0;
00389   }
00390   if(shape != NULL)
00391   {
00392     shape->e = 0;
00393     shape->u = friction;
00394     shape->collision_type = eolEntityClipLevel;
00395     cpShapeSetLayers (shape, eolEntityClipLevel);
00396     cpSpaceAddStaticShape(space, shape);
00397   }
00398   return shape;
00399 }

00401 void eol_level_add_triangle_to_space(cpSpace *space,eolFace *face,eolMesh *mask)
00402 {
00403   if ((!space)||(!face)||(!mask))return;
00404   /*TODO dont add duplicate edges to the space*/
00405   eol_level_add_segment_to_space(mask->_vertices[face->vertices[0]].x,
00406                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[0]].y,
00407                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[1]].x,
00408                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[1]].y,
00409                                  space);
00410 
00411   eol_level_add_segment_to_space(mask->_vertices[face->vertices[1]].x,
00412                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[1]].y,
00413                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[2]].x,
00414                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[2]].y,
00415                                  space);
00416 
00417   eol_level_add_segment_to_space(mask->_vertices[face->vertices[2]].x,
00418                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[2]].y,
00419                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[1]].x,
00420                                  mask->_vertices[face->vertices[1]].y,
00421                                  space);
00422   /*TODO see if I need to catch these and free em up later.*/
00423 }
00424 
00425 void eol_level_add_mask_to_space(eolLevelLayer *layer)
00426 {
00427   int i;
00428   if (!layer)return;
00429   if ((!layer->space)||(!layer->clipMesh))
00430   {
00431     eol_logger_message(
00432       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00433       "cannot add clipmesh to space %s: missing data\n",
00434       layer->idName);
00435     return;
00436   }
00437   for (i = 0; i < layer->clipMesh->_numFaces;i++)
00438   {
00439     eol_level_add_triangle_to_space(layer->space,
00440                                     &layer->clipMesh->_faces[i],
00441                                     layer->clipMesh);
00442   }
00443 }

00446 {
00447   eol_level_update(_eol_level_current);

00450 void eol_level_update(eolLevel *level)
00451 {
00452   eolLevelLayer *layer = NULL;
00453   if (!level)return;
00454   layer = g_list_nth_data(level->layers,level->active);
00455   if (layer == NULL)return;
00456   /*presync*/
00457   eol_entity_presync_all();
00458 
00459   cpSpaceStep(layer->space,0.01);/*TODO: make configurable*/
00460 
00461   /*post sync*/
00462   eol_entity_postsync_all();
00463 }

00465 void eol_level_add_entity_to_active_layer(eolEntity *ent)
00466 {
00467   if (!_eol_level_current)return;
00468   eol_level_add_entity_to_layer(g_list_nth_data(_eol_level_current->layers,
00469                                                 _eol_level_current->active),
00470                                 ent);
00471 }
00472 
00473 void eol_level_add_entity_to_layer(eolLevelLayer *layer, eolEntity *ent)
00474 {
00475   if ((!layer) || (!ent))return;
00476   eol_entity_add_to_space(ent,layer->space);
00477   if (ent->_space != layer->space)return;
00478   layer->entities = g_list_append(layer->entities,ent);
00479 }
00480 
00481 void eol_level_remove_entity_from_layer(eolLevelLayer *layer, eolEntity *ent)
00482 {
00483   if ((!layer) || (!ent))return;
00484   layer->entities = g_list_remove(layer->entities,ent);
00485   eol_entity_remove_from_space(ent);
00486 }
00487 
00488 void eol_level_remove_entity_from_active_layer(eolEntity *ent)
00489 {
00490   if (!_eol_level_current)return;
00491   eol_level_remove_entity_from_layer(g_list_nth_data(_eol_level_current->layers,
00492                                                      _eol_level_current->active),
00493                                      ent);
00494 }
